dict.string: Today is 45 days, which are six weeks and three days, of the Omer.
Hoy es cuarenta y cinco días, que son seis semanas y tres días del Omer.
Aujourd'hui est quarante-cinq jours, qui sont six semaines et trois jours du Omer
СЕГОДНЯ СОРОК ПЯТЬ ДНЕЙ - ЧТО СОСТАВЛЯЕТ ШЕСТЬ НЕДЕЛЬ И ТРИ ДНЯ - ОМЕРА.
הַיּוֹם חֲמִשָּׁה וְאַרְבָּעִים יוֹם שֶׁהֵם שִׁשָּׁה שָׁבוּעוֹת וּשְׁלֹשָׁה יָמִים לָעֽוֹמֶר
Tiferes ShebeMalchus
Tiferet ShebeMaljut
Tiféret chebeMalkhout
ТИФЕРЕС ШЕБЕ-МАЛХУС
תִּפְאֶֽרֶת שֶׁבְּמַלְכוּת
Tiferet of Malchut
Compassion in Nobility
Examine the compassion of sovereignty. A good leader is a compassionate one.
Review an area where you wield authority and see if you can polish it up and increase its effectiveness ,by curtailing excesses and consolidating forces.
Is my compassion compromised because of my authority?
Do I realize that an integral part of dignity is compassion?
Do I manage a smooth--running operation?
Tiferet -- harmony -- is critical for successful leadership.
Am I organized?
Do I give clear instructions to my subordinates?
Do I have difficulty delegating power?
Does my organization work as a team?
Do we have frequent staff meetings to coordinate our goals and efforts?
